name: shelly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
made of, like, or relating to shells: In ancient seabeds, they spotted numerous small, shelly fossils. The shelly sand showed marks of tractor tracks. The water receded, leaving behind a deposit of coarser, shellier sand.
More examplesFewer examplesWe’d found a patch of particularly shelly sand earlier in the day.Many bays on the west of the island have areas of shelly sands.The beetle had been turned onto its shelly back and could not right itself.It is a low, flat island, with sandy or shelly beaches that are visited by many migrating shore birds.The divers were exploring the shelliest part of the sea bed.
